aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.introDev: We, Olivia and Renat, are passionate developers who took on the challenge of creating a powerful and user-friendly real-time chat application. With our experience in web and software development, we successfully brought this project from concept to implementation. Our goal was to build a modern, fast, and secure communication platform.
aboutUs.appDev: Our real-time chat application is built on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). By utilizing cutting-edge technologies and best practices, we developed a robust and scalable architecture.
aboutUs.usedTechFrontend: Frontend: React with Vite for an optimized development environment, Zustand for state management, and Tailwind CSS/React-hot-toast for an appealing UI design.
aboutUs.usedTechBackend: Backend: Express.js as the web framework for Node.js, MongoDB as the NoSQL database, bcrypt for password encryption, and Express-session for secure authentication.
aboutUs.usedTechSocket: Real-time Communication: Socket.io enables smooth real-time messaging.
aboutUs.usedTechClaudinary: Cloud Integration: Cloudinary is used for storing and managing images.
aboutUs.featuresRegister: Our application allows users to register, log in, and communicate in real-time.
aboutUs.featuresUI: Modern user interface, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices
aboutUs.featuresAuth: User registration and login with secure authentication
aboutUs.feedback: We appreciate feedback and suggestions and warmly invite developers to contribute to the further development of the app!

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.dataDescription: This real-time chat app is a training project developed for educational purposes. The developers of this training project are responsible for data processing within this app.
privacy.dataTypesDescription: When using our chat app, we collect and process the following personal data:
dataTypesList: üñºÔ∏è Uploaded images (stored and sent via Cloudinary)
privacy.purposeDescription: The collected data is used solely for operating the chat function, enabling real-time communication between users. There is no commercial use or transfer of data to third parties.
privacy.securityDescription: Please note that all messages and images are transmitted and stored unencrypted. This poses a risk that third parties may access transmitted content. We recommend not sharing sensitive or confidential information via this app. However, passwords are securely stored using bcrypt encryption to ensure user account security.
